name: @assert/generator-lambda
description: Lambda function for handling text generation

tasks.build: deno bundle src/index.ts -o index.js && echo '{"type": "module"}' > package.json && zip -X -D -9 -r -u ../../assert-generator-payload.zip index.js package.json && rm index.js package.json
tasks.generate-scenario: echo 'import { handler } from "./index.ts"; Deno.serve(async (req) => handler({body: await req.text()}));' > src/local.js && bash -c 'deno run -A --env-file src/local.js & PID=$!; sleep 3; curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data "{\"action\": \"generateScenario\"}" 127.0.0.1:8000; rm src/local.js; if [ -n "$PID" ]; then kill $PID; fi'
